body.name: Hanalei Aloe Face Cleansing Gel Gentle and Oil-Free Face Wash For All Skin Types – Made with Aloe, Vit E, and Natural Hawaiian Botanicals - Made in USA, Vegan and Cruelty-Free (5 oz)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 13 hrs 55 mins
features: Gentle Face Cleanser: Our all-in-one gentle aloe gel face cleanser helps to remove makeup, cleanse and tone without stripping skin’s natural moisture.

Minimizes Redness: Featuring aloe, a star skincare ingredient known for leaving skin feeling soothed, cool, and refreshed, this simple face wash will calm your skin and minimize the appearance of redness.
Only the Finest Hawaiian-Grown Ingredients: Boosted with our proprietary Aloha Nui Complex, a unique combination of Hawaiian botanicals that give you beautiful, healthy-looking skin with every wash.

For All Skin Types: Unlike regular acne soaps, cleansers, or acne face wash on the market, our sensitive skin face wash is perfect for all skin types. This gentle face cleanser cleanses and hydrates the skin.

Cruelty-free and Vegan Formula: Our gentle facial gel cleanser is cruelty-free and vegan-friendly. It is formulated to perfection without performing or engaging in any product trials on animals. We are certified as a cruelty-free brand in the Leaping Bunny Program.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Sugar Lip Scrub Kukui Oil Lip Treatment Island Aloe Gel Kona Peptide Eye Cream Makai Marine Hawaiian Face Moisturizer More Island-Powered Beauty from Hanalei Real turbinado sugar exfoliates dry skin, while Kukui nut oil smoothes lips. For best results, use before Hanalei Lip Treatment. Kukui nut oil moisturizes and revitalizes dry lips, while antioxidants protect from harmful radicals. For best results, use after Hanalei Sugar Lip Scrub. Contains natural regenerative properties that help balance the appearance of redness and uneven skin tone. A daily caffeine fix that revitalizes tired looking eyes, this super-concentrated eye cream is packed with island goodness –powerful peptides, Hawaiian botanicals and coffee from nutrient-dense volcanic soil. Deeply hydrating, this gel-cream is infused with revitalizing marine proteins and minerals harvested from seaweed, algae and sea water. The marine actives support the skin microbiome to help reduce the appearance of redness and skin imperfections.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this face lotion. I get dry skin, but not when I use this. Makes my face soft and smooth. Super lightweight, dries fast! If you have sensitive skin, use this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle and Hydrating for Dry, Sensitive Skin
reviews.reviewText: I have very dry skin, but oil cleansers and balms just don’t leave me feeling clean even if they do a good job removing my (extremely minimal) makeup. Gel cleansers tend to be drying even if they promise otherwise.This stuff is different. It feels like washing your face with aloe gel. Its so gentle I can scrub it onto my eyes and all of my reactive skin with no issues, but still feels cleansing and moisturizing. Its got a lovely soft light scent and while expensive, the bottle is a good size. I think it’s the only facial cleanser I will actually rebuy in the past 10 years or so of experimenting with skincare.Of note: SHAKE THE TUBE BEFORE YOU SQUEEZE OUT PRODUCT, as it tends to separate and get liquidy if you don’t, and way more comes out than you need. I just shake the tube a bit before I squeeze to emulsify it again and it’s great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An amazing find!
reviews.reviewText: I have searched high and low for a cleanser that doesn’t dry my face out; I found it!!!! After menopause my skin, especially my face, is dry! No products I purchased, even when it was designed for dry skin, worked! My face always felt stripped! Now, this product landed in my lap! I had a sample and decided on day to try it. I used it until it was gone because it is an amazing product! My skins feel soft, not overly moisturized, with no residue.Try this product if you haven’t! You won’t be disappointed!!!Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Moisturizing, great smell, light weight and just does the trick

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everything you need
reviews.reviewText: This is seriously the best moisturizer I’ve tried in a loooong time. It’s a gel so you only need a tiny amount to cover your whole face and neck area.Love it.Love how it leaves my skin feeling silky soft after I apply it. It’s not oily and it doesn’t feel sticky!!And I can honestly say that I see a difference in my skin complexion.Definitely recommend! Specially because you get 50% off your next purchase 😍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Switched to Hanalei after 50 year loyalty to other Brand.
reviews.reviewText: After being loyal to one brand for 50 years, I changed facial cleansers to Hanalei Aloe E Hawaiian! Hanalei is light weight, with a faint, pleasant floral-fresh smell. I only need a tiny amount of this transparent, green liquid to produce enough lather for my entire face and neck, and by tiny, I mean less than the size of a pea! My face feels clean and smooth, but not tight.At $24 for ________, using such a scant amount twice daily, I imagine the tube will last quite awhile.I initially discovered this product as a paid for sample through IPSY.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A little goes a long way
reviews.reviewText: For how long lasting this product is, it’s not a bad price at all!I have sensitive, oily type skin and deal with constant dryness as a result of living in the desert.Normal moisturizers just weren’t enough and face masks became too much and began causing breakouts on my skin.This product is such a treasure! I dab a little bit on my face and neck in the evening and my skin stays moisturized throughout the night. It is so lightweight on your skin and true to advertisement it is not greasy at all.My skin feels hydrated and looks beautiful and healthy after just a few days of use.Don’t think twice, just buy it you will not regret it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Eye Makeup Remover
reviews.reviewText: I initially bought the smaller ones from their website because this kept selling out - its that good. Could t wait to get the full-size bottle.This is great for eye makeup remover. With warm water, this and a soft washcloth, eye makeup comes off easy. There are times where I have to put a little more on, gently massage in on, and it all comes off-especially with a swoop/cat eye line.There isn’t tugging or pulling needed. It gently cleanses and works better than expected.
